channel.title: NPC Walking
channel.description:
My NPC's dont seem to want to walk anymore.
[code] spawn = 1001 3254 3430 0 3257 3435 3252 3425 2 Dark Mage [/code] First NPC I made that walks, now, when I go to add another one... [code] spawn = 222 2826 3342 0 2827 3343 2830 3345 2 Monk [/code]
The monk wont walk, I have the range 1 and range 2 working right, but, wont work. Please help?

item.title: NPC Walking
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

My NPC’s dont seem to want to walk anymore.

spawn = 1001	3254	3430	0	3257	3435	3252	3425	2	Dark Mage

First NPC I made that walks, now, when I go to add another one…

spawn = 222	2826	3342	0	2827	3343	2830	3345	2	Monk

The monk wont walk, I have the range 1 and range 2 working right, but, wont work. Please help?

Read full topic
